name: Arrowmancer
storyline: A high-strung witch and an easy-going black cat plot to take over the Solar System by starting a company to grant all the human wishes in the universe. A heart-warming, hilarious tale of the triumph of heart's desire against all odds.
summary:
Arrowmancer is the world's first machine learning illustrated anime game! Powered by Waifu Labs!

Challenge yourself with genre-defining RPG mechanics that combines a mixture of strategy and reflexes. Easy to pick up, but difficult to master!

Meet and connect with a universe of infinite characters. Explore the solar system and conquer its challenging dungeons. Level up your witches and become an interplanetary legend!

Your solarpunk magic adventure awaits!
